eek hasina thi kathamalawe thema dasuna prabhedaya awalambana thrasakaya aparadha natya thanuwe sinewistas limitad rachanaya kale samir arora nirmanathmaka adhyakshaka(waru) siddharth malhothra rangapama sanjida sheyik wathsal sheth simoni sin aayub khan arambaum themawa "eek hasina thi" - sunidhi chauhan[1] wisini sambhawa rata bhashawa(n) hindi (pradhana) bengali saha ingrisi (sulu) kathawara sankhyawa kathanga ganana nishpadaka(yo) prem krishan sthanaya(n) kolkatha (pasuthalaya) mumbayi (rugatha kirima) kamara salasma bahu-kamara miniththu 20 mul nalikawa star plas urdu 1 rupa aakruthiya mul dhawanaya aprel 14, 2014 (2014-04-14) – desambar 20, 2014 (2014-12-20) bahira sabandi eek hasitha thi (sinhala: rumath lalanawaka wiya) yanuwen handinwenne sinewistas limitad aayathanaya wisin nirmanaya karana lada aparadha santhrasa rupawahini kathamalawaki. 2014 aprel 14 ිta 2014 desambar 20 dakwa meya star plas nalikawen wikashaya kerini.[3]
